roleset.name: to swamp or overwhelm as if with a flood
roleset.note: INUNDATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'inundate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from inundate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: inundate-v: passive
example.text: Suddenly , on television , in advertisements and on their cereal boxes , Americans-1 were inundated [*-1] with news about the obscure seed .
example.arg: on television , in advertisements and on their cereal boxes
with news about the obscure seed

example.name: alias-n
example.text: Short-term seawater inundation of coastal floodplain sediments resulted in decreasing surface water pH.
